page.title: 15 ******RECREATIONS******
page.content: Willinton has several sports and recreational activities. The schoolhas the usual sports teams of Badminton,Football and Netball.Each play in friendly games against other schools in the area. Within the village there are adult team for football,netball,bowls badminton and tennis. The football team meet twice each week,during the season, for practice on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Most of their competitive games take place on Sundays. Their 'home' pitch is on the village playing fields. The badminton club meet at a sports hall in nearby Repton. A smaller group of badminton players also meet at the village primary school during the winter months. The bowls club and tennis club both play matches during the summer.
